law.text: Unless a contrary intent is expressly indicated in the will, a legacy of specific property shall pass subject to a security interest or lien on the property which existed at the time of execution of the will or which is a renewal, extension, or refinancing. If a security interest or lien is created or attaches initially after the execution of the will, the legatee is entitled to exoneration.
